name: VoBadge
description: Adds a VO (Version Originale) badge to series posters when the content is only available in the original language without the preferred language audio track.
overview: Visual Indicator for Original Language Content

versions.changelog: Critical fix: EnumerateAllItems() now properly queries library using ILibraryManager.GetItemList() instead of reflection. Should now process existing items at startup.
Enhanced logging: Added comprehensive debug/info logs throughout BadgeService to trace initialization, event handling, and badge creation for easier troubleshooting.
Fixed: Use BadgeService instead of IDynamicImageProvider for reliable badge application. IDynamicImageProvider is for generating new images, not modifying existing ones.
Initial release with VO badge support for TV series
Initial release with VO badge support for TV series
